181a6(nyi khri): bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ 'di la chos mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyongs ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ 
181a7(nyi khri): tshangs pa 'am/ skyes dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjesu
181a8(nyi khri): ma mthong bas bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jig pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du
181b1(nyi khri): seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa' ba 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste chos dang ldan par bskor
181b2(nyi khri): bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zod do zhes dam bca' na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze
181b3(nyi khri): 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi
181b4(nyi khri): mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pathog dang dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ 
181b5(nyi khri): khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'a ra gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khra ra lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/ 
181b6(nyi khri): bdud dam tshangs pa 'am gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag
181b7(nyi khri): la brtan na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan sus yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na
181b8(nyi khri): chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa
182a1(nyi khri): dang mi 'jigs pa thob pas rnam par spyod de khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig
182a2(nyi khri): rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa'am gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag
182a3(nyi khri): gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na sdug bsngal yang dag par zod par 'gyur bar mi
182a4(nyi khri): 'byung ngo zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am ba dud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs su ya dang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar
182a5(nyi khri): 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / 
182a6(nyi khri): mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ 
182a7(nyi khri): bram ze'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ 
182a8(nyi khri): bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag pa
182b1(nyi khri): rig pa dang // nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ don la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / 
182b2(nyi khri): nges pa'i tshigs la dmigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sku'i spyod pa yong
182b3(nyi khri): su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su mngag po mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bca' bar dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi
182b4(nyi khri): mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o// de bzhin gshegs pas gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongasu
182b5(nyi khri): ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shas su 'ong ngo zhes gang / yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la/ mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni srung ba med pa gnyis pa'o// 
182b6(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes ga
182b7(nyi khri): yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni srung ba med pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ 
182b8(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe/ la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed na yang des
183a1(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/ yid bde bar mi 'gyur/ thugs yeng yeng por mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o// 
183a2(nyi khri): lal rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed na/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar mi 'gyur
183a3(nyi khri): mi bzod par mi 'gyur/ thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la/ 
183a4(nyi khri): chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed/ lal rna ba rab tud de rim gror mi nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du
183a5(nyi khri): mi byed kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa 'am/ thugs khro bar mi 'gyur te/ thams cad du dgongs pa/ dang ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni
183a6(nyi khri): dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir/ 
183a7(nyi khri): sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi 'da' ba ste/ de ni nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ 
183a8(nyi khri): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad nyon mongs pa spangs kyang lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyide bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu mi mnga' ste/ de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes
183b1(nyi khri): bya'or de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum du rtog pa
183b2(nyi khri): mdzad ces bya ste/ dngos sun sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs partag par 'byung ste/ de ni thugs rje chen
183b3(nyi khri): po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// caco ma mnga'o// dgongs pa nyams pa
183b4(nyi khri): mi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga'o// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o// mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// 
183b5(nyi khri): brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyam sa pa mi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// 
183b6(nyi khri): rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// sku'i 'phron las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjesu
183b7(nyi khri): 'brang ngo // gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rje su 'brang
183b8(nyi khri): ngo 'das pa'i dus lam thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags
184a1(nyi khri): mthogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
184a2(nyi khri): gra zhe na/ gang la dmigs pa med pa dran pas dbang bsgyur ba/ ni nga'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// 
184a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong drag nyi shu lnga pa dum bu tham// bam por brgyad pa// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs
184a4(nyi khri): 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas nga ba dang / gdang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa dang phyag dang zhab ngas gnon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba dang / 
184a5(nyi khri): sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba/ dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen tu 'khyil pa dang / ringags e ne ya'i byin
184a6(nyi khri): pa lta bu dang / phyag brla drang por sleb pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / s+phu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa
184a7(nyi khri): dang zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / ro stod seng ge lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhung mdzes par grub pa dang / phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / shing n+ya gro da ltar
184a8(nyi khri): chu ning gab pa dang / dbu spyigatsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / 'gram pa seng ge lta bu dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang
184b1(nyi khri): tshems shin tu mnyam dang / tshems shin tu thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin
184b2(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can/ lta ba dang bcas pa rnam po thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/ rus pa'am/ ba so
184b3(nyi khri): la gzugs su brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o// zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa med pas zhabs
184b4(nyi khri): shin tu gnas pa'o// ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs da kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel pas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa'o// shing bal gyi sgong ltar shin tu 'jam
184b5(nyi khri): zhing gzhon pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o// phyag dang zhabs dang mgur gyi lhun shin tu mtho bas/ bdun shin tu mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor
184b6(nyi khri): mo ring bas sor mo ring ba'o// rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o// sku lag pa bdun tu 'phags la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o// pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu mdzes par nub pas
184b7(nyi khri): zhabs legs par mtho ba'o// s+phu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pas/ yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o// ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa dang / smig ma dang ldum bu dar
184b8(nyi khri): bltar drang zhing / mnyams la/ rims kyis gzhol bar grub cing byin pa zlum pas/ ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu'o// brla drang por gzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil
185a1(nyi khri): gnyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas/ phyag brla drang por sleb pa'o// glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas gsang / 
185a2(nyi khri): ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go// gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug
185a3(nyi khri): la sku la rdul gyis mi gos pas/ mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o// shin tu rnam par bye ba'i spu re re nas skyes shing gnyis su med pas/ s+phu ra ra nas g.yas phyogs su la byil pa'o// 
185a4(nyi khri): me tog kun da dang / zla ba dang / 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la/ nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las dang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod bus smin mtshams
185a5(nyi khri): shin tu brgyan pas/ zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o// ro stod tsha bas seng ge'i ro stod do// mgur dang / rgyud legs par 'brel cing lhun zlum pas phrag pa'i lhun
185a6(nyi khri): mdzes par grub pa'o// gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas/ brag so shin tu rgyas pa'o// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan gyis ma nyams shing
185a7(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med pas/ ro bro ba'i mchog go/ sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas/ shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa'o// spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas
185a8(nyi khri): phyogs su 'khyil pa dang ldan pa'i nga bu mnyam zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// me tog ud pa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog ltar
185b1(nyi khri): 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas/ ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o// tshangs pa dang ba ka la bing ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor
185b2(nyi khri): ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o// me tog kun da dang dung gi bcag bro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas/ tshems shin
185b3(nyi khri): tu dkar ba'o// tshems la mthon dman med pas tshems mnyam pa'o// tshems la mtshams mdod pas tshems thags bzang po'o// bla 'og rgya rgu med pas tshems mnyam zhing bcu
185b4(nyi khri): chang ba'o// dkar gnag gi cha ma 'dres la shin tu rnam pa ra dag cing mdog dmar pos ma yog pas/ spyan dkar gnag 'byes pa'o// rdzi ma shin tu legs/ 
185b5(nyi khri): par gnas la ma 'dzings pas ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o// de la/ bla ma la bsu bsgyel dang chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang / gtsug lag dang / mchod rten la sogs pa la sti stang
185b6(nyi khri): byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so// yi dam lo bstan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ de ni yid mi g.yo
185b7(nyi khri): zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas so// basbyin pa dang ngag snyan dang / don spyod pa dang / don 'thun pas bsdu ba rnams bzhi goms par byas pas/ phag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel
185b8(nyi khri): pa ste/ de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas so// bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun
186a1(nyi khri): shin tu mthob ste/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung bzhim zhing nyams su bde ba thob pa'i lnga ltas so// bcings pa bkrol ba dang / 
186a2(nyi khri): srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs par dang / sku che zhing drang ba ste/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// dge ba'i chos
186a3(nyi khri): yang dag par blangs pa dang / bzung ba mngon par sprul cing 'grib par ma byas pas/ zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen tu 'khyil pa ste/ de ni mi mnyam pa'i chos
186a4(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so// rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gro/ dar byas shing gzhan byin pa dang / bdag gis blang nges pas ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni myur
186a5(nyi khri): du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so// bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs/ na mi 'gong bar gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas/ phyag brla drang por sleb pa sto/ de ni yo byad la mnga' ba
186a6(nyi khri): dang dul ba'i snga ltas so// grogs po dang mdza' bshes dang / gnyen ma phye ba dang / be bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / 
186a7(nyi khri): gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrung bas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste// de ni bu mang po'i snga ltas so// stan dang / gos dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / 
186a8(nyi khri): gnas bzang po byin pas/ gser gyi kha dog dang mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni gdan dang na bza' dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po thos
186b1(nyi khri): pa'i snga ltas so// 'du 'ji spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / pu nu la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gro byas pa dang / btsun par
186b2(nyi khri): byas pa dang / bcol ba rnams chung ma gzan pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni nyam pa med de'i sngo ltas so// mi snyan par
186b3(nyi khri): mi zer zhing mi smod la/ snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa 'thun par 'dzin pas/ seng ge'i ro stong lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa med pa'i snga
186b4(nyi khri): ltas so// na ba rnams la rtsi dang / rim gro dang / nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim gro byas pas/  phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste
186b5(nyi khri): de ni nang nyung ba'i snga ltas so// skyed mos tshal dang / 'khor ba dang btung ba dang / rdzing bu dang / brgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang / phreng
186b6(nyi khri): zas gnas dang stegs dang / gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs pa gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing bdag gis gzhan byin pas/ shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa dang
186b7(nyi khri): dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams bde bar smras pas/ ljags shin tu yangs
186b8(nyi khri): shing slob pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes
187a1(nyi khri): shing / rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyanan dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjesu 'byung ba dang / btang mi bla ning rdar snyan pa dang / 
187a2(nyi khri): ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o// yun ring po nas tshig khyal pa spangs shing dus su smra smra bas/ sang ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so// rim gror bya ba
187a3(nyi khri): dang brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas/ tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / mnyam pa ste de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so// yun ring po nas bden
187a4(nyi khri): shing phra ma med pa'i tshig sgra smra bas/ tshems thags bza dang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so// pang gis khyud
187a5(nyi khri): pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa med la/ mi chags mi snga kha dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis blta bas/ spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ don
187a6(nyi khri): kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so// rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 
187a7(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
187a8(nyi khri): ni gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang bde bo'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo'i mdog sdum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon
187b1(nyi khri): por byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
187b2(nyi khri): shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rims kyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rims kyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
187b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang / gsung dang / sku'i phrin las dang / 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/ rtsa mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i
187b4(nyi khri): mdud pa 'brel pa ste/ rtsa la mdud pa med pa yin/ sangs nga rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas
187b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams cad las gro la ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge'i ste/ seng ge'i
187b6(nyi khri): 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ma'i glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam
187b7(nyi khri): mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i khyu mchog ste/ khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
187b8(nyi khri): 'das rnams ni 'thun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas
188a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mingang bste/ mayo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston
188a2(nyi khri): ba ste/ sku shin tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ su shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos
188a3(nyi khri): rims kyis ston pa ste/ sku rims kyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang gsung dang thugs gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas
188a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang / ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sang ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam
188a5(nyi khri): par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na tsha dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dpe byad shin tu
188a6(nyi khri): rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste/ sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can
188a7(nyi khri): thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ sku shin tu gzhon pa
188a8(nyi khri): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku zhum pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
188b1(nyi khri): byang ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku shin tu 'khregs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
188b2(nyi khri): rnams ni rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / nying lag legs par ston pa ste/ yan lag dang nying lag sba bar mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs
188b3(nyi khri): pa shin tu dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ phyal zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas
188b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin/ tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u
188b5(nyi khri): bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa rnam par bzlog pa ste/ phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
188b6(nyi khri): 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/ lte ba zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'thun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yas phyogs
188b7(nyi khri): su 'khyil pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
188b8(nyi khri): thugs shin tu gtsang ba ldan pa ste/ kun spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ sku/ 
189a1(nyi khri): la sle ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing ngal ltar yang ba tu thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing ba la ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs
189a2(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang / skye bo phal la byams pas/ dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu/ 
189a3(nyi khri): zab cing brtan par zhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/ phyag gi sor mo ring ba yin/ sangs
189a4(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cangayang mi ring bar 'chab ste/ zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs
189a5(nyi khri): brnyan 'jig rten du bkye ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du bting zhing 'dul ba ste/ ljags
189a6(nyi khri): shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin tu srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis
189a7(nyi khri): pa'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyis chos dang 'dul ba'i gting dpag par dka' ba ste/ ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang / 
189a8(nyi khri): 'brug gi sgra lta bus brnyengs pa mi mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang / 'drug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang bden par
189b1(nyi khri): smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems ma
189b2(nyi khri): ba shin tu zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul
189b3(nyi khri): ba shin tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ tshems mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ 
189b4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtog pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshams mche ba rim gyi das gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
189b5(nyi khri): ni shes rab kyi ri mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs/ par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ 
189b6(nyi khri): shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
189b7(nyi khri): ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/ rdzi ma sdug pa yin/ sangs
189b8(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang / skyes bu dang / ne chung mchog mig dkar nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ste/ spyan
190a1(nyi khri): dkar nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs par gzigs pa ste/ smin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ 
190a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ smin
190a3(nyi khri): ma'i sku mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems can snum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs
190a4(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/ snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i
190a5(nyi khri): rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyan mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa/ nyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan
190a6(nyi khri): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnams pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
190a7(nyi khri): ni bas kyi sgrol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa
190a8(nyi khri): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba rnam par bzlog pa ste/ dbu sna bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang bsgoms
190b1(nyi khri): bas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu skrag sdug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu skra 'jam pa yin/ 
190b2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam sa ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbu sku ma 'jing ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang bral ba ste
190b3(nyi khri): dbu skra mi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo 'thun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu skya dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
190b4(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang / bkra de shis dang / dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin/ rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
190b5(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o// rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos rnaMs de dag dang / gzhan la bshod pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa de
190b6(nyi khri): ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ 
190b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor da ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshig snyan pas sems
190b8(nyi khri): can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
191a1(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab
191a2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas/ sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de ltar pha rol
191a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dag pa'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab
191a4(nyi khri): 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dan bya bas sems can sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'a byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu
191a5(nyi khri): phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdudapa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol/ tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus
191a6(nyi khri): pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don 'thun pa
191a7(nyi khri): sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdudado// de ci'i phyir
191a8(nyi khri): zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don 'thun pas sems can
191b1(nyi khri): rnams sdud do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang slad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
191b2(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad 'doms shing 'di stod ston to// rigs kyi bu khyed tshur sheg/ yi ge
191b3(nyi khri): mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyi shig/ yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du mkhas par gyis shog/ yi ge gcig gis
191b4(nyi khri): byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad she das par gyis shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis
191b5(nyi khri): byung ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgo ma shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus
191b6(nyi khri): par sgoms shig ces chos ston to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge gcig/ 
191b7(nyi khri): gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgom pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa
191b8(nyi khri): la mkhas par bya na/ de la goms shing yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrubs pa la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
192a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge mang pos yi ge med pa'i chos ston kyang
192a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang smad du byung ba'i chos te/ gang nyan thos dang
192a3(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin da'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa
192a4(nyi khri): dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shin tu mi dmigs/ chos kyang mi dmigasachos kyi dngos po yang mi dmigs pa lags na/ bcom
192a5(nyi khri): ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu byin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
192a6(nyi khri): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
192a7(nyi khri): 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting
192a8(nyi khri): nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
192b1(nyi khri): soso yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad
192b2(nyi khri): bzang po brgyad cul spyod cing / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/ de la ni sems can mi dmigs te/ sems/ 
192b3(nyi khri): can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang // 
192b4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa pa co brgyad kyi bar du mi dmigs su mchis so// sems can/ 
192b5(nyi khri): mi dmigs pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar/ du dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmig/ sa pas/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dmigs su
192b6(nyi khri): ma mchis so// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can dmigasu ma mchis pa la sems can ma mchis so// gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang // 
192b7(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du ma mchis so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis so// mi chen
192b8(nyi khri): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ma mchis so// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
193a1(nyi khri): bkyi ro tu phyin pa la spyod pa nga/ byang chubasams dang da kyang med rigs na/ ngargyu thugs kyims rnams dmigs par sa stsagasas sa/ 
193a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// rab 'byor de ltar sems can mi dmigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 
193a3(nyi khri): phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rig par bya'o// phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// khams stong pa nyid du rig par
193a4(nyi khri): bya'o// skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rten cing 'gro dal bar 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bden pa ste/ dang nga nyid du rig par bya'o// bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 
193a5(nyi khri): sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / byed du
193a6(nyi khri): 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du/ 
193a7(nyi khri): rig par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 
193a8(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
193b1(nyi khri): dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams/ 
193b2(nyi khri): ba chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir
193b3(nyi khri): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong
193b4(nyi khri): pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig dpar bya'o// sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
193b5(nyi khri): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams ca de stong par mthong nas/ phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems
193b6(nyi khri): can rnams la chos ston te/ ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la yang mi 'jug pa de ltar ston to// des de ltar mthong bas chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes te/ chos gang la yang 'khrugs par mi
193b7(nyi khri): byed gnyis su mi byed do// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang ston par byed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni sprul pa bye ba phrag du mar sprul cing / sems
193b8(nyi khri): can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ lal tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la lo brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
194a1(nyi khri): lal bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan bzhi dang / lal tshad med pa bzhi dang / la la gzugs med pa'i
194a2(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sbyor/ la la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / la la rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / la la mthar kyis
194a3(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / la la stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / la la mngon par shes pa la sbyor/ la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / lal
194a4(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/ la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / la la mi 'jigs pa bzhid / la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / la la byams pa
194a5(nyi khri): chen pa dang / la la snying rje chen po dang la la sang / sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor/ la la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
194a6(nyi khri): 'bras bu dang / la la dgra bcom pa nyid dang / la la rang byang chub la sbyor/ la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la sbyor na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa des chos la la
194a7(nyi khri): zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
194a8(nyi khri): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nos/ ma btsongs ma grol ba'i tshul du yang dag pa ji ltar
194b1(nyi khri): bzhin du rab tu 'god do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma
194b2(nyi khri): grol ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
194b3(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'om bcings ma grol ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin pa de rnam
194b4(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// de ci'i phyir ni/ na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
194b5(nyi khri): par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu rnam par dag par/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
194b6(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams chos ston kyang sems can du mi dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos rnams mi dmigs pa
194b7(nyi khri): la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 
194b8(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la ni gang yang gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir/ 
195a1(nyi khri): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba de ltar bu'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs te/ dngos po med pa la dngos po med pa mi gnas so// rang bzhin la rang bzhin miganas/ 
195a2(nyi khri): so gzhan gyi dngos po la gzhan gyi dngos po mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag thams cad dmig su med de/ gang dmigs su med pa de ni gang la yang mi gnas so// rab 'byor
195a3(nyi khri): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid thams cad kyis rab tu 'byed de/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi
195a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dadapa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 
195a5(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyon thos rnams dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi skyon du mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang
195a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / nyan thos de dag gis kyang chos nyid de dang / de'i rje su rtogs nas kyang sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 
195a7(nyi khri): de yang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' ba med do// de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni 'da' ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
195a8(nyi khri): de dag la gang 'da' bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin med do// de nas tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos kyis
195b1(nyi khri): snyom pas par mtshas/ de ban dang / yang dag pa thar la yang 'ang gapa mchis na ci lags/ 'on gzugs pang gzhanas/ tsam kyang gyis kyang gzhan/ deban na/ 
195b2(nyi khri): kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ 
195b3(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang
195b4(nyi khri): gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no// gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi
195b5(nyi khri): dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag/ pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang
195b6(nyi khri): gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/ chos kyi
195b7(nyi khri): dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
195b8(nyi khri): gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
196a1(nyi khri): kyang gnan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gnan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings/ 
196a2(nyi khri): kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/ 'o na ji ltar chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod cing / nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin
196a3(nyi khri): pa/ nag po ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dkar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa/ dkar po ni lha dang mi/ dkar nag gi chos
196a4(nyi khri): rnams kyi rnam par smin pa/ dkar nag ni bde ba dang / sdug bsngal rnams nyams su myong ba/ mi gnag cing mi da// dar ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa/ mi gnag cing mi
196a5(nyi khri): dkar ba'i rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cigaphyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / 
196a6(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mor bya ste/ 
196a7(nyi khri): 'bras bu rnam par dgod par bstan gyi/ don dam pa'i bden pas ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod par bstan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de ni rnam par brtag tu med pa/ 
196a8(nyi khri): brjod du med pa tha snyad med pa ste/ 'di ltar ming bden pa dang / gzugs bden pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par
196b1(nyi khri): byang ba med pa ste/ de ni mthara' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung
196b2(nyi khri): ste'abras bu rnam par dgod pa lags kyi/ don dam pa'i bden par ma lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
196b3(nyi khri): 'brus bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
196b4(nyi khri): sul ba rab 'byor ci byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'om/ don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/ gal te shis na ni de dag kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ 
196b5(nyi khri): lan cig phyir 'ong po'i 'bros bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'dra sa bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
196b6(nyi khri): tu rnam par dgod par gyur na/ rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la lam yang med/ lam rnam par dgod pa yang med/ lam bsgom pa yang med par byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
196b7(nyi khri): la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lta ga la 'ong / rab 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni lam yang yod do// lam bsgom pa yang yod pas na/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag de la
196b8(nyi khri): 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu thob pa 'am/ 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan/ 
197a1(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ lam bsgom pas 'bras bu thob pa'am/ 'bras bu thob par bya ba med de/ rab 'byor lamam bsgoms
197a2(nyi khri): par yang 'bras bu thob pa med de/ lam gyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba yang med do// lam lam gnas par yang 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
197a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod par byed de/ 'dus byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing
197a4(nyi khri): 'bras bu rnam par dgod par mi byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams das mo/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing
197a5(nyi khri): 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyar ba gsum spangs pas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// 'dod pa'i 'dod chag
197a6(nyi khri): dang / gnod sems bsrabs pas/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'og ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu
197a7(nyi khri): sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid do// gang ci yang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pa ni rang byang chub bo// bag chags kyi mtshams
197a8(nyi khri): sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das ris su bcad cing 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi
197b1(nyi khri): chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par bzhag pa ma mchis na/ gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs
197b2(nyi khri): pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
197b3(nyi khri): byang chub 'dus byas sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
197b4(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la ris su bcad pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
197b5(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta
197b6(nyi khri): stematshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur na/ de'i tshe 'dus byas shes sam/ 'dus ma byas shes chos grang la yang ris su gcod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
197b7(nyi khri): 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
197b8(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams la ris su bcad pas/ chos mi ston to// de dag kyang
198a1(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan
198a2(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan dang po'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/ bsam gtan gsum pa 'am/ bsam gtan bzhi pa
198a3(nyi khri): 'am byams pa 'am/ snying rje'am/ dga' ba 'am/ btang snyoms sam/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i// rnam shes mtha' yaskye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i/ 
198a4(nyi khri): cung zad mod pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam
198a5(nyi khri): yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rna mas sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams/ sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ lam mam/ 
198a6(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ 
198a7(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin
198a8(nyi khri): rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ 
198b1(nyi khri): snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ram/ chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// de mngon par zhen pa med
198b2(nyi khri): pas chos gang la yang chags pa med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med sbyin pa'i 'bras bu
198b3(nyi khri): nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
198b4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / 
198b5(nyi khri): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byos kyi chos rnams bsgom yang / 'dus byas/ 
198b6(nyi khri): dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs/ 
198b7(nyi khri): su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don tu 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams bsgom mo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang pha rol tu phyin pa
198b8(nyi khri): drug dang / chos thams cad la spyod de/ chos gang la yang gnas pa 'am/ chags pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid shin tu khong du chud do// shes
199a1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu gnyis
199a2(nyi khri): so// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
199a3(nyi khri): pos chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba stsal pa/ rab 'byor sprul pa ni 'dod chags dang / zho sdang dang / gti mug la yongs su
199a4(nyi khri): spyod pa med de/ bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas sdang da ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// phyi nang gi chos rnam das la yongs su spyod pa med do// zag pa dang bcas pa dang / 
199a5(nyi khri): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// gzugs la yongs su spyod/ 
199a6(nyi khri): pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
199a7(nyi khri): la yongs su spyod pa med do// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams ca dang / byang chub kyi phyog sum cu rtsa bdun la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'phags pa'i bden
199a8(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
199b1(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
199b2(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
199b3(nyi khri): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yongs su spyod pa med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
199b4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi mtshan
199b5(nyi khri): nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga po// bam po re dgu pa// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
199b6(nyi khri): 'das sprul pas lam bsgoms pa la brten kyang / kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur lo// 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na yang mi gda' na/ lam
199b7(nyi khri): bsgom du ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas
199b8(nyi khri): nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
200a1(nyi khri): ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang
200a2(nyi khri): par 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
200a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ci lags/ gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ 
200a4(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par de shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs
200a5(nyi khri): thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o// tshor ba dang / 'du she sa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang / sprul pa lta bu'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan
200a6(nyi khri): 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan
200a7(nyi khri): 'das sprul pa la ni gzugs ma mchis/ 'tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/ rnam par
200a8(nyi khri): byang ba ma mchis/ gang las grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
200b1(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye
200b2(nyi khri): gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha 'am/ mi dag las yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang dmigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lto ma lag so// 
200b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems
200b4(nyi khri): can gang yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir ne no/ da ltar de ni chos thams cad skye ma lta bur shes so// mthong ngo // rtogs so// sprul pa lta bur mthong ngo // 
200b5(nyi khri): rtogs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad rgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing / mthong ste rtogs
200b6(nyi khri): la/ sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/ rtogs pa lags na/ gang gi don tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags/ bsam gtan
200b7(nyi khri): bzhi dang / tshang mang pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas
200b8(nyi khri): gyi chos sa 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa lags/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam gyi bar la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi ning songs/ 
201a1(nyi khri): su dag par bgyid pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te sems can
201a2(nyi khri): rnams rang rang gi chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can rnams kyi don tu bskal pa grangs med par byang chub sems
201a3(nyi khri): dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod de/ rab 'byor sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mi shes pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs
201a4(nyi khri): med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do// sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
201a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ mig mo ra lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom
201a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das sems can rnams ci la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams gyen du spyod par bgyid/ bcom
201a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can rnams ni ming dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa la gnas pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
201a8(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / de dag ming dang mtshan ma las gyen du skyong ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ming ni gang lags/ mtshan ma ni gang lags/ bcom
201b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ ming zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni glo bur du ming gis sgro btags pa'o// 'di lta ste ming zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes
201b2(nyi khri): bya ba'am/ gzugs shes bya ba 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du shes zhes bya ba'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba'am/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ bud med ces bya ba 'am/ 
201b3(nyi khri): skyes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba 'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba'am/ sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba
201b4(nyi khri): 'am/ lha zhes bya ba 'am/ mi zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba
201b5(nyi khri): 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ dgra brtso/ ma pa nyid ces bya ba'am/ rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ 
201b6(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni sgyu ma'i ming gis sgro btags pa ste/ rab 'byor ming thams cad ni ming gi don gyis btags pa ste/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la
201b7(nyi khri): chags par 'gyur ba'i 'dus byas thams cad ni ming tsam ste/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas ming
201b8(nyi khri): thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyis/ yongs su brtags pa la dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong la mkhas
202a1(nyi khri): pa rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi byed do zhes skul bar byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
202a2(nyi khri): tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa yin no// rab 'byor mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gnyis po 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i
202a3(nyi khri): mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang / ma
202a4(nyi khri): 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ bzang ba'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgya ring ba 'am/ thag nye ba 'am/ gang la chos thams
202a5(nyi khri): cad skad cig ma las kun tu rtog pas bzung ste/ 'di ni ga zugs kyi mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i chos
202a6(nyi khri): gang yang rung ba ste/ mtshan mar bzung bas yongs su brtags shing nyon mongs par skye bar 'gyur ba ste// 'di ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems
202a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag la dkrol zhing / mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/ 
202a8(nyi khri): ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o// 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'o// zhes bya bar gnyis su mi lhung ba de ltar 'god cing gnog ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
202b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par dkrol zhing mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do// gsol pa/ gal te/ 
202b2(nyi khri): chos 'di dag thams cad ni de tsam du bas ste/ ming dang mtshan mar btags pa tsam du bas te/ yongs su brtags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
202b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par thob la gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing
202b4(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sa nas sa yongasu rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
202b5(nyi khri): 'byor gal te ngos pa'i/ dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shaM/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ khyad par
202b6(nyi khri): thob par yang mi 'gyur/ gzhan yang khyad par thob pa la sbyor bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma yang med/ dngos po yang med pas na/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang
202b7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
202b8(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
203a1(nyi khri): su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su
203a2(nyi khri): rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / 
203a3(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang
203a4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med
203a5(nyi khri): ba'i tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mtharagyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i
203a6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang
203a7(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
203a8(nyi khri): bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu rdzogs par byed do// de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas
203b1(nyi khri): nas mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/ rab 'byor gal te chung ngun skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyi khyon cig mtshan ma yod na yang / byang
203b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
203b3(nyi khri): mi 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang / zag pa med pa'i chos la gzhog par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor zag pa mang po'i chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa
203b4(nyi khri): med pa yid la byed pa med pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro/ la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams
203b5(nyi khri): kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad ma/ tshan ma ma mchis shing / dran pa ma mchis te/ yid
203b6(nyi khri): la bgyi ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig
203b7(nyi khri): rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi/ 
203b8(nyi khri): chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni byang
204a1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes ji ltar bgrang bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 
204a2(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
204a3(nyi khri): de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang
204a4(nyi khri): gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan
204a5(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med panyi/ da du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu'o// dgra
204a6(nyi khri): bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub bo// byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// sangs rgyas kyi chos so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dade lag so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lag so// 
204a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa 'di
204a8(nyi khri): la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen po ni dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel lo// 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
204b1(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang
204b2(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
204b3(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
204b4(nyi khri): med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin tham das cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
204b5(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sang / sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de ma yin
204b6(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chas dpag tu med pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
204b7(nyi khri): smon pa med pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ 
204b8(nyi khri): 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// mtshan ma dang bral ba ni mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni smon pa med
205a1(nyi khri): rnam par byar 'i sgo ste/ rnam da thar ba'i sgo gsum pa 'das slob pa'i byung chub sems dadu sems dpa' chen po ni dung po lnga la skyob pa yin/ skyem ched du/ 
205a2(nyi khri): gnyis la slob pa yin/ khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan log bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ ba rob tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyi
205a3(nyi khri): slob pa yin/ dngos pa med pa'i nga bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slab pa yin/ yang dag par spong po bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / 
205a4(nyi khri): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam
205a5(nyi khri): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med kha'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam parathar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
205a6(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob pa
205a7(nyi khri): yin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
205a8(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar
205b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
205b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rab tu shes te/ gzugs ji ltar skye ba 'am/ gzugs ji ltar
205b3(nyi khri): 'gag pa dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin par rab tu shes so// de la ji ltar na gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na dbu ba'i phung po snying med pa ltar shin tu
205b4(nyi khri): song ldong dang // shin tu gas tshags dang / shin tu sti/ dang po med par rab tu shes te/ de ltar na gzugs she/ sa pa yin no// ji ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa
205b5(nyi khri): shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang / mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs
205b6(nyi khri): ba de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin
205b7(nyi khri): nyid ni mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byung ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid
205b8(nyi khri): du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu'i chu bur
206a1(nyi khri): gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba ni gang nas kyang
206a2(nyi khri): 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de/ gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba'i
206a3(nyi khri): skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tsher ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gog 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin// 
206a4(nyi khri): rnam par byang ba ma yin 'bri ba ma yin/ 'brel ba ma yin/ te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste// de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na tshor ba'i de
206a5(nyi khri): bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ smig rgyu la chu shin tu mi dmigs pa de ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes
206a6(nyi khri): shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang
206a7(nyi khri): mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa ste/ gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa
206a8(nyi khri): yin zhe na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye ma'i gag 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ de byin
206b1(nyi khri): log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dperan/ 
206b2(nyi khri): chu shing shun pa so sor phye na/ snying po shin tu mig migs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du da shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du
206b3(nyi khri): byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong/ gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de/ gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ 
206b4(nyi khri): de ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// da ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med// 
206b5(nyi khri): 'gro ba med pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste// 
206b6(nyi khri): de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi
206b7(nyi khri): tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni gang nas
206b8(nyi khri): kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa da / gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ni rnam par
207a1(nyi khri): shes pa skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa banan// sbyi nu rnam par shes par di ban ny-id shes pa ni nen/ rnam par shes pa 'di bzhin nyid ni skye mi 'gag 'ong ba med pa/ 
207a2(nyi khri): ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs po ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin 'brib ma yin// 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid
207a3(nyi khri): ces pa'o// de ltar rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong / phyi'i chos rnams
207a4(nyi khri): ni phyi'o chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/ de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ mig gi khams kyang mig gi
207a5(nyi khri): khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzugs kyi khams kyi nga gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mig gi rnam par shes
207a6(nyi khri): ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams
